title: News24.com | Reflections on Lockdown: South Africans around the world speak about their experiences
description: As the Covid-19 pandemic spread its wings globally, governments around the world began implementing lockdowns, forcing everyone to stay home under strict conditions.
content:
As the Covid-19 pandemic spread its wings globally, governments around the world began implementing lockdowns, forcing everyone to stay home under strict conditions. 
As of Friday, global deaths topped 100 000, with nearly 1.7 million cases.
